data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
I saw a gradient caricature in an art gallery where a group of religious-looking girls, not sure if they were nuns or something else, had veils. In one scene, they were reading books, then they took off their veils, became happy, did girly stuff like makeup, wore heels and short clothes, swam, kissed their partners, had sex, etc.

It was like telling a story and grasped my attention. Are there any movies with a similar theme?
